text: Myriam P. Sarachik (August 8, 1933 â€“ October 7, 2021) was a Belgian-born American experimental physicist. She was a Professor of Physics at The City College of New York. Her works focused on the low temperature condensed matter physics. In 2008 she was elected to the governing council of the National Academy of Sciences. ==References== ==Other websites== * Autobiography *CUNY Low Temperature Group bio * CCNY profile *Why Physics? by Myriam P.
